title: Forbidden Archeology - The Hidden History of the Human Race (gnv
description:
Forbidden Archeology: The Hidden History of the Human Race (First Edition 1993, revised 1996, 1998)
by Michael A. Cremo and Richard L. Thompson 
Bhaktivedanta Book Publishing | January 1998 | ISBN-10: 0892132949 | ePUB/PDF | 3.9/25 mb <a href="
http://www.amazon.com/Forbidden-Archeology-Hidden-History-Human/dp/0892132949" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.amazon.com/Forbidden-Archeology-Hidden-History-Human/dp/0892132949</a>

Over the centuries, researchers have found bones and artifacts proving that humans like us have existed for millions of years. Mainstream science, however, has supppressed these facts. Prejudices based on current scientific theory act as a "knowledge filter," giving us a picture of prehistory that is largely incorrect.

About the Author
Michael A Cremo is a research associate of the Bhaktivedanta Institute specializing in the history and philosophy of science. His persistent investigations during the eight years of writing Forbidden Archeology documented a major scientific cover-up. Richard L. Thompson, founding member of the Bhaktivedanta Institute, received his Ph.D. in mathematics form Cornell University.
